text: Dissé-sous-le-Lude is a former commune. It is in the Pays de la Loire region in the Sarthe department. This is in the western part of France. On 1 January 2018, it became a part of the commune of Le Lude.Arrêté préfectoral 15 November 2017 == References == Category:Former communes in Sarthe
title: Dissé-sous-le-Lude
